item.title: Influential Books
item.description: The following are a few of the books which Iâ€™ve found impactful in my day-to-day thinking, work and career development since graduating from university. Measure What Matters: How Google, Bono, and the Gates Foundation Rock the World with OKRs Takeaways: OKRs are incredibly valuable in their ability to focus an organization or team, but poorly constructed OKRs can do more damage than good. Clear goals and measurable results are a focus mechanism that help an organization scale out.
